name: Dismantle On Sight
Lore: 'After losing control of several extremely powerful and deadly assassin droids, the Empire issued a decree ordering their immediate destruction.',
Text: 'Use 4 Force to deploy on a droid with armor (free on IG-88). At end of any opponent''s turn, droid is immediately lost if present with an Imperial (or with a bounty hunter if droid is IG-88).',
